title: Data-Driven Inductive Language Learning: Intensive Course for Science Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary scientific terminology comprehension and basic smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Customized course for enhancing science-related English communication skills among professionals. Optimizing smartphone-based learning activities in limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can data-drivenly discover frequently occurring language patterns in science (e.g., experimental report structures) with 80% accuracy.
Learners can infer the contextual usage of 15 core vocabulary combinations extracted from real scientific papers with over 70% accuracy.
All participants can collaboratively produce a word cloud or simple infographic as an outcome of applying science-domain language patterns through project-based learning.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
